main_definition: Rico is an adjective used to describe something as being of high quality, particularly in relation to taste or flavor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: High-quality food with great taste and richness.
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant serves delicious rico chocolate desserts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a lot of substance or strength.
meanings_and_examples.example: The boxer is known for his rico punches, displaying immense power in the ring.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Extremely wealthy or possessing great financial resources.
meanings_and_examples.example: He comes from a family of bankers and has lived a very rico life.
